title: Today, I downloaded the DigiLocker app and pulled my class 12 marksheet, but it's showing the marksheet in which I got failed,not the updated marksheet. What could this mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: First digilockar provides current situation of your data although wait for some time or I can say from July your locker get updates regarding your new information because cbse provides or share there data with digilockar so when cbse update there data your information get changes in digilockar or for more details contact cbse by visiting their office not by calling their helpline because they never attend any call
